hero_page.heading: Books, Coffee and what else?.
hero_page.description: For centuries books have prevailed as the source of knowledge, truth, wisdom, and entertainment - crossing realms to reach people intellectually, spiritually and emotionally.

intro.heading: Posts
intro.description: We suggest books for the the bookstagramers, and get suggestions from them.

activities.heading: Fun activities
activities.description: We organize fun activities like #booksharing. Where readers around the world can participate and exchange books which they like!

art.heading: We also make art works!
art.description: We create candle arts, stickers and many more!!.

suggested_books.about_book: About young love and discovery. Puja - 19, confused, energetic, fiery. Her philosophy - Life is complicated and only super achievers have it figured out. Her strict mother sends her to a rural location in Kerala to spend her summer vacation doing volunteer work.
suggested_books.author: Preeti Shenoy

suggested_books.book_name: Life is what you make it
suggested_books.about_book: Life Is What You Make It is based on a love story that has been set in India in the 90s. It has been described by the readers as a book portraying how love, hope and determination can together win over even the destiny.
suggested_books.author: Preeti Shenoy

our_insta_posts.description: Something I never told you by Shravya Bhinder is a love story with all the ups and downs you could possibly imagine. Raunak, the protagonist has a crush on Adira and this crush turns into one sided love in no time.
our_insta_posts.author: Shravya Bhinder
our_insta_posts.type: Romance novel, Noir fiction, Contemporary romance

our_insta_posts.description: The wicked King and The Queen of Nothing
our_insta_posts.book_name: The wicked King and The Queen of Nothing
our_insta_posts.author: Holly Black

our_insta_posts.description: Life is what you make it.
our_insta_posts.book_name: Life is what you make it.
our_insta_posts.author: Preeti Shenoy

contact_info.heading: Contact Us
contact_info.subheading: Far far away, behind the word mountains, far from the countries Vokalia and Consonantia
